onLoad: function f(s,i, a = level.iMixing, f=()=>{}) { return [s+':', [{tag:'input', type:'range', min:-3, max:3, step:0.001, value:a[i], oninput() { a[i] = +this.value, f() }}], [{tag:'br'}]] }  /*TODO:*/level.iMixing=[1.05, -3, 0.95, 0.246, 0.47, -2, -3, 0.43, 0.54];  api.window([[{tag:'details', open:''}, [{tag:'summary'}, 'Pointer'], f('Emittance', 'emittance', level.actors.pointer, x => api.write('pointer'))], [{tag:'details', open:''}, [{tag:'summary'}, 'Mixing'], f('R→R', 0), f('R→G', 3), f('R→B', 6), f('G→R', 1), f('G→G', 4), f('G→B', 7), f('B→R', 6), f('B→G', 7), f('B→B', 8)]], null, null)
